songs.title: Work It Out (Blow Your Horn Dub)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Uh
See you gotta work
See you gotta work
See you gotta work
See you gotta work
See you gotta work
See you gotta work
See you gotta work it out

Blow your horn now
Blow your horn now
Blow your horn now
Come on Chad, blow your horn now
Blow your horn now
Blow your horn now
Blow your horn now
Come on Chad, blow your horn now
Blow your horn now
Blow your horn now
Blow your horn now
Come on Chad, blow your horn now
I like it when the horn go

[Bridge]
So baby hold me like you don't wanna let go
I'm feeling foxy 'cause boy you working it out
Daddy, you've given me a taste of your honey
I want the whole beehive
I'm gonna call you my sugar
'Cause I had the sweetest time

[Chorus]
See you gotta work it out
You gotta work it out
You gotta work it out
You gotta work it out
You gotta work it out
You gotta work it out
You gotta work it out
You gotta work it out
You gotta work it out
You gotta work it out
Work it out
Work it out

[Outro]
See you gotta work it out
